statements: UPDATE ecotourism_locations SET location_name = 'Mountain Valley' WHERE location_id = 1;
UPDATE ecotourism_locations SET coordinates = '40.7128° N, 74.0060° W', biodiversity_data = '{"flora": ["Oak Tree", "Pine Tree"], "fauna": ["Deer", "Bear"]}' WHERE location_name = 'Forest Reserve';
UPDATE ecotourism_locations SET location_name = 'Forest Reserve' WHERE location_id = 1;
UPDATE ecotourism_locations SET biodiversity_data = '{"trees": 150, "animals": ["lion", "elephant"]}' WHERE location_id = 2;
UPDATE ecotourism_locations SET accessibility = true WHERE location_id = 1;
UPDATE visitor_logs SET visitor_name = 'Alice', visit_duration = '2 hours' WHERE log_id = 5;
UPDATE ecotourism_locations SET biodiversity_data = '{"trees": 500, "animals": ["tiger", "elephant"]}' WHERE location_id = 1;
UPDATE visitor_logs SET visit_duration = '2 hours', visitor_name = 'Alice' WHERE log_id = 100;
UPDATE ecotourism_locations SET location_name = 'Rainforest Reserve', coordinates = '12.3456,78.9101', accessibility = TRUE WHERE location_id = 1;
UPDATE location_reviews SET rating = 5, review_text = 'Beautiful natural spot with diverse wildlife!' WHERE review_id = 101;

UPDATE trails SET difficulty = 'Moderate', length = 5.5 WHERE trail_id = 3;

UPDATE locations SET name = 'Forest Park', accessible = true WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE activities SET duration = 120, activity_type = 'Hiking' WHERE location_id = 2;
